issue.title: Embed extraction interface XSDs files in com_easysdi_shop
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

For the extraction interface, XSD files are located on easysdi.org website.
If those files cannot be accessed, validation fails and the web service crashes.

I propose to embed those files in the component.
\components\com_easysdi_shop\controllers\xsd\extract\*.xsd

Pros : 
* file version doen't have to be managed
* each version of easysdi contains the correct version of XSD
* easySDI install does not depends of easdysdi.org website availability or internet access
* XSDs will be versionned in SVN (currently out of the CVS)

Questions : 
* do we keep the the online shemas up to date (declared xsi), and how do we manage versions ?

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated the proposition to embed the xsd files.

The question about the online version of those files is kept open : do we have to maintain them and how to manage version?
